title: 1.7.2 服务器安装了Essentials但指令任不能用
txt_content:
1.7.2服务器 ESS安装后不管用，什么指令都用不了

换了各种ESS都一样不管用

[20:37:25 INFO]: Starting minecraft server version 1.7.2
[20:37:25 INFO]: Loading properties
[20:37:25 ERROR]: Exception handling console input
java.io.IOException: 存储空间不足，无法处理此命令。
        at java.io.FileInputStream.readBytes(Native Method) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
        at java.io.FileInputStream.read(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_67]

        at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_67]

        at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.read(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_67]

        at java.io.BufferedReader.fill(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_67]
        at java.io.BufferedReader.readLine(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.7.0_67]

        at ll.run(SourceFile:78) [minecraft_server.1.7.2.jar:?]
[20:37:25 INFO]: Default game type: SURVIVAL
[20:37:25 INFO]: Generating keypair
[20:37:25 INFO]: Starting Minecraft server on *:25565
[20:37:26 WARN]: **** SERVER IS RUNNING IN OFFLINE/INSECURE MODE!
[20:37:26 WARN]: The server will make no attempt to authenticate usernames. Beware.
[20:37:26 WARN]: While this makes the game possible to play without internet access, it also opens up the ability for hackers to connect with any username they choose.
[20:37:26 WARN]: To change this, set "online-mode" to "true" in the server.properties file.
[20:37:26 INFO]: Preparing level "world"

[20:37:27 INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 17%
[20:37:28 INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 50%
[20:37:29 INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 91%

以上是开服时的后台bat内容。求大大告知

replies.author: 神の手
replies.txt_content: 是储存空间不足？如果是你自己家电脑开服或者是vps开服的话右键开服器[cmd]然后用记事本打开修改里面的内存

神の手 发表于 2015-7-27 20:46
是储存空间不足？如果是你自己家电脑开服或者是vps开服的话右键开服器[cmd]然后用记事本打开修改里面的内存 ...
是自己家的服务器 开服器？我没有 是不是那个bat格式的启动服务器的那个文件？

CJ帝 发表于 2015-7-27 22:13
楼主你的硬盘满了吧
也没有啊= =！
